message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SE 

The paper discusses the use of blockchain and smart contract technology for delegated authorization in IoT devices, which involves security and privacy concerns (cs.CR). It also involves information retrieval and management of authorization policies (cs.IR), as well as distributed computing and execution of smart contract code on blockchain nodes (cs.DC). The use of blockchain technology also relates to networking and communication in IoT environments (cs.NI). Finally, the implementation of smart contracts involves software engineering and programming (cs.SE).
